mapper.insert:
SELECT FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY ( FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY_NO, FLIGHT_OFFER_ID, FLIGHT_OFFER_PRICE_TOTAL, FLIGHT_OFFER_CURRENCY, FLIGHT_OFFER_ONE_WAY, FLIGHT_OFFER_DEPART_DATE, FLIGHT_OFFER_RETURN_DATE, FLIGHT_OFFER_API_QUERY_DATE, DEPART_IATA_CODE, ARRIVE_IATA_CODE, AIRLINE_ID ) VALUES ( #{historyNo}, #{offerId}, #{priceTotal}, #{currency}, #{oneWay}, #{departDate}, #{returnDate}, #{apiQueryDate}, #{departAirport}, #{arriveAirport}, #{airlineId} )
